BIO

Hi! I'm Srihari Vishnu, and I am currently a student at Waterloo Collegiate Institute. My passions include app development and business, and I am always looking for more opportunities to grow! My technical skills include a strong background in the following languages: C++, Java, Python. I have also used Android Studio, Xcode, and Unity as development platforms. I am also familiar with JavaScript, Swift, HTML, Tensorflow, and Git. Please feel free to reach out to me at srihari.vishnu@gmail.com for any opportunities or inquiries!

Open Learning Exchange

Software Engineer Intern

The Open Learning Exchange is a social benefit and for-purpose organization based in Cambridge, Massachusetts. The mission is to provide universal quality education using open-source materials and technology to overcome educational barriers. It has been proven highly effective in improving learning opportunities for over fifty thousand learners in more than 100 locations, in schools throughout Nepal, Ghana, Kenya, and Rwanda, with Syrian refugees in Jordan, Somali refugees in Kenya, and village health workers in Uganda.
